mainHero.title: Be Green
mainHero.subtitle: Be Sexy.
mainHero.description: Do your part and ride with GreenWaveBoardZ - an eco-friendly surfboard shop that is committed to saving the environment. Surfing is one of the most environmentally sustainable sports there is. With boards from us, you can enjoy the waves without doing damage to our beloved nature.
mainHero.subdescription: Join us on this journey towards a cleaner world!

items.title: Get your eco-friendly Board!
items.description: We use recycled materials for our boards and environmentally-safe methods for production. That means no animals were harmed in the making of our boards! It's time to get rid of those environmentally hurtful boards. GreenWaveBoardZ is a leading surfboard company that provides high-quality surfboards made from recycled materials. We take pride in our surfboard manufacturing process and take care to make sure that every customer is fully satisfied with their purchase. Our customers are happy because they know they're getting a high-quality board that's good for the environment.

items.title: Make it your own!
items.description: We specialize in designing custom surfboards with our team of world-class surfboard designers and state-of-the-art technologies. Our craftsmen use the highest quality materials to give you a surfboard that not only stands out, but lasts a lifetime. Our ecological boards are not only good for the environment, they're also stylish and sleek. Design your own board as easily as you design your own surfboard with our customizer tool! Each board is made by hand from sustainably harvested wood.

features.title: Recycled & Renewed
features.subtitle: Using the best we can find!
features.description: Our experienced surfers know how important it is that a surfboard is light, stiff, and fast so they team up with our expert engineers to create products that are shaped for maximum performance. With us, you can be sure your board is made close to home, by skilled craftsmen. We not only sell great eco-friendly surfboards, but we also want to make a difference. By buying from our store, you're supporting the efforts to save the ocean and help this world in a way that not many other stores can provide!

items.name: Locally & sustainably harvested trees
items.description: We're not just making boards — we're also taking care of our planet. We use sustainable materials like driftwood, and locally harvested trees to make boards that have a positive environmental impact. Our boards are produced in an eco-friendly manner, using environmentally friendly materials. With every purchase, you're helping to make the world a better place!

items.name: Recycled plastic
items.description: We donate 10% of our profits to recycling initiatives to help keep our beaches clean. We also use recycled plastic in all of our products, which will help reduce our carbon footprint and help protect the environment. We are part of a new wave of businesses that are changing the way we do business. We believe in sustainability, making sure that what you buy doesn't end up as more waste in landfills or in the water.

items.name: Shapes & Forms
items.description: We know how important it is for a board to feel right in your hands. This is why we offer a wide range of shapes and sizes—from fish boards to high performance boards. Customise your board by choosing the features that will work best for you.

items.name: Giving back to the environment
items.description: We shorten the lifespan of a surfboard by over 50% by using eco-friendly materials such as biodegradable plastics, recycled materials, and plant-based resins that are environmentally sustainable. We offer recycling programs where we'll buy back your old board in exchange for cash. This way, you can be sure that your old board won't end up in a landfill.

items.name: High standards
items.description: Don't settle for anything less than a high-quality board that's built to last. Our boards are built by experts in the field and made with high quality materials - all with an eco-friendly twist, of course!

items.name: Dedication to the last fibre
items.description: Devoted craftsmen work tirelessly on every single board we make from cutting down trees, shaping the wood and sanding it down all the way until it's ready for production, ensuring that every single board we sell is outstanding.

items.name: Ask us
items.description: We've been doing this for years and we know what makes a good surfing experience - so don't worry if you're not an expert as we'll help guide you every step of the way.

items.name: Developing new ways to clean the oceans
items.description: We've seen a major shift in the way people think about their environment and we want to lead that charge by promoting environmental awareness that extends beyond just recycling. That's why we include a free recycling service with every purchase from Green Wave Boards.

quotes.author: Gina
quotes.description: I wasn't sure wether I should spend that much money on a board... but after trying it out Iam so happy I didn't miss this! ITS SO WORTH IT!

quotes.author: Sven
quotes.description: I have been surfing with the same board for over 10 years, so when I heard that GreenWaveBoardZ new eco-friendly surfboard has been released and it's just as good as my old one was, I was very excited. I loved the idea of designing my own board. It's even better knowing it is made from recycled materials. The best part is --- no more guilt in throwing out all the old ones.
